ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: If( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ) < DATE(2019,06,21) ,false ,If( AND(OR( Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0003', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0006', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0009', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0021', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12424', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12427', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12430', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12433' ), ISBLANK(Prompt_Pay__c),NOT( Is_Migrated__c )), true,false))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: กรุณาระบุค่า
